SUVACompany.description: Is the insurer of the compulsory accident insurance SUVA? Only relevant for UVGZ.

premiumOASUVA.description: Mandatory if SUVA company = 'Yes'. Premium rates are always specified as a percentages in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.

premiumNOASUVA.description: Mandatory if SUVA company = 'Yes'. Premium rates are always specified as a percentages in the format xxx.yyyyy. Note: A premium rate of 0.5‰ is displayed as 0.05%.
